title: Lag spikes since 08/08/2017
body:
since this day i have lag spikes, mostly around 300ms

it isn't my connection, because friends won't have this issue

i hope u could help me.

replies.body: I've also been getting several lag spikes every few seconds in games. My connection is fine but as of the recent patch the lag spikes have become really bad suddenly.

I'd be happy to be of your assistance! High Ping can be a sign that your client isn't connecting to the Server Properly, but if you run through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) it should fix you right up. If you still have issues after running through the guide then make sure to reach out to me. 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
i can seem to work it out, might need some help
Pff,and nothing has changed. This killed me 2-3 times and left me without maybe 10 kills in my games. It was so good before.
league of legends lag spike in game
Not sure if you're running wifi or direct but I had the same issue on Wifi and I had to turn off auto connect for my wifi and it worked!
